Author: Flodner
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Recently there happened "attack" of new users, from Philippines mostly They were auto-hired to my task but most of them or everyone didn't complete the task. I'm not willing to pay 10 LATX for nothing, so I declined payment (in order to free budget for normal applicants) and my Employer score decreased from 756 to 398... Not very good experience, but at least we know how it works...  For other simpler task may be it will be easier to give them 0.10 LATX.. than to worsen Employer score even more  I hope my experience is helpful for for Latium active users and Latium team

Author: Kevind360
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Hey Flodner,  I've also experienced many "lazy" employees, but in your case there were several options you could have utilized.  - You can set the minimum Employee score required for tasks, perhaps in this case you would have chosen someone with a score of 600+ - Instead of "Declining Payment", you could have sent either a "Second Chance" request or a "Mutual Cancellation" request, this ensures that you're Employer score does not get affected - You also have the option as an Employer to set up "Bonds", this will ensure that only a dedicated Employee will apply for the task - And Finally, if your Employee does not complete the work, They have 48 hours after a Mutual Cancellation to complete the work, you would then have the option to withdraw their contract and rate them appropriately.

Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform

When you have several tasks (both as Employer and Employee) it's not comfortable to scroll always from the main menu  2. Think about making photo gallery of some images (i.e. Twitter, youtube, airdrop) - then creation of task will become even easier and faster. In example if I need some complex or creative task - I can upload images, but If I need follow on twitter or facebook like - it would be easier to select predefined "twitter" or "facebook" image.

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: LATIUM Launches Revolutionary New Platform For The Gig Economy and Instantly Created A New Paradigm In The Way Gig Workers In The Global Community Interact https://bitcoingarden.org/latium-launches-revolutionary-new-platform-for-the-gig...  Cryptocurrency and Blockchain Technology has entered almost every niche of today’s society on a global scale. It was only a matter of time before some forward-thinking company would introduce it in the form of a new online platform to create a vastly improved modis-operandi for the ever-expanding world of Gig Workers. A segment on CNN Money recently published an article which found that the U.S gig economy accounted for roughly 34 percent of the U.S workforce and is expected to climb to 43 percent by the year 2020, according to Intuit CEO Brad Smith. The global number of Gig Workers would reflect a vastly higher number.  Fortunately, the team at Latium has launched their much-anticipated platform for the Global Gig Workforce. Latium is a tasking platform which enables employers to create tasks in which a potential employee can complete for payment. These tasks can either be done in the digital or physical world and can be offered as a one to many, or as a one to one employment situation....

Author: mfchiro
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Does Latium Beta have a referral program? At the start, I had sent a referral link to several colleagues, but this was the alpha platform, and I'm not seeing anything regarding referrals on the beta.   I plan to refer users (both employers and employees), as well as investors.   For example, if I had a big job, say I need a website built, and I knew who I wanted to do the job, let's call him Tom.  Ideally, I would invite Tom to join LATX and then I could pay him for the task in LATX.  Tom then, as a member of LATX, could stay on and compete and build his business in this ecosystem.    The referral program would incentivize this type of trade activity on LATX, increasing the use of the coin, and thus increasing the value of the coin - but you already know this....  I have several projects in the works with clients at a different task site, not related to LATX and not crypto (Upwork.com); and I know they would be interested in transferring their services to the LATX platform, but my inviting them to LATX hinges on an answer to the above.

Author: klasik1980
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: https://web.telegram.org/#/im?p=s1115590112_2759724383067719704  Kevin Steele  admin I think the important cliff note version of today to keep in mind is this :  LATX is now listed on Yobit. We were not informed prior to this decision, but instead saw it occur at 7AM CST.  We submitted applications to the top 50 exchanges by volume. It is not under our control if or when an exchange chooses to support a specific ERC20 token.  David had made mention that the goal is 4 - 10 exchanges before a production environment (take note, this does not refer to beta).  The yobit listing is not the listing we have discussed previously. We still have a confirmed exchange listing by the end of March that we feel the community will be positive towards.  We are still on schedule of our publicly listed roadmap and will continue to do all in our power to ensure this continues.  From our core Latium is structured as a business, offering a product, for a consumer. The platform of task completion is the very essence of who we are, our reason for existing in this space.  To those who support us and remain positive, we are happy to have you here. To those wishing to sell immediately, we respectfully understand and wish you all the best in your cryoto endeavors.

Author: Latium
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Hello. We understand your concern and have answered this question many times in our main Telegram group chat. Here is was we can say on the matter:  a) We have emailed and or submitted applications to the top 50 exchanges on CMC. b) We are in direct conversations with multiple of these exchanges. c) We are currently up for voting on Huobi. d) We have no issue paying for listing and expect to do so. e) Immediate listing is less important to us than finding a synergistic partner (One that does not require tokens to sell).  Thanks!

Body: We are not purshing ED or IDEX, however as noted previously, LATX is based on the Golem structure.:  Latium followed the path of Golem when creating the LATX token. Author: Sidzukana
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: LAT & LATX are separate tokens.  LAT was the token issued during the pre-sale phase in September. We decided to create the LATX token because a larger supply and lower initial price would benefit the platform long term. Only LATX will be used inside platform. So there will eventually be only one token. You can transfer LAT to LATX at a 50 LATX per 1 LAT ratio here: https://latium.org/latx

Author: Flodner
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Ok, I registered because I like the idea, I think such projects needs to exists. Also I took part in Twitter bounty campaign, so I hope I will receive tokens soon  About the platform here is my feedback: 1) Improve usability I.e. I can open task in a new window, then I need to return and scroll-scroll to find needed task Also adding categories (filters) might be good idea, especially when there will be more tasks and users  2) Why Bond/Guaranty is needed? Firstly it was not so understandable for me, why is it needed, especially on small tasks (such as like facebook page, follow on Twitter) You either do this small task and get paid or don't do it and you are not paid. While on big tasks this might be good idea, for smaller tasks I think it's not necessary. Also I would advise to remove this in the beginning, so more users will register  3) Tasks which i already did appear again  Also it seems withdrawals are not working, but may be that's because it's alpha version.  I hope this feedback was useful

Author: mfchiro
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: I believe what will make LATX one of the great cryptos out there will be not only the unique innovative concept that will cause the coin to be traded and circulated, which then will drive up its value, but the team behind LATX is truly a GREAT team, they have impressed me over and over again, and every time they impress me, I buy in a little more.  Just recently, I posed a series of questions to Support regarding affiliate commissions, future referral plans, etc.  And within 2 days I got a reply, completely answering all my questions one by one.  I wasn't even expecting a reply because it was not a pressing issue or problem, and these guys came through.    I've been with Latium since day #3 of the ICO (11/25/17) and I plan to stay with them all the way to the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.    If you haven't gotten in yet, now is the time, hype or no hype, they're selling out of tokens fast -- a clear indicator they are onto something good.   For the newbies, you can click here to get started:  https://latium.org/welcome/mfchiro   You may also contact me by private email (listed on the left).

Author: Sidzukana
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: You should check website again. Token sale will end on March 1st or earlier (if all tokens are sold earlier). If on March 1st there will be unsold tokens - they will be burned. Exchange question is good, but exchanges have NDA (non disclosure agreement) and to avoid legal issues team will not tell anything about exchanges now. They are under NDA whether you like it or not. If some projects announce exchanges during the token sale - it's their choice, but it means that they are breaking NDA.

Author: mfchiro
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Yes target is selling all tokens and they are WELL ON THEIR WAY!  Only 60 mil left to reach the target of 180 mil.  That is absolutely fantastic!  this one is the next 'big thing'  To top it off, they have a 5% commission referral in effect, so you sign up, you are given a link to give to others, and if they sign up using your link, you collect 5% commission from LATIUM on whatever they spend to buy their coin.  So, feel free to click here to get started:  https://latium.org/welcome/mfchiro  Let's say you buy $100 of tokens (approx 1,250 LATX at .08 per coin).  Latium then sends me $5.00 in token (or 40 LATX coin), for your spending $100.    Once you are signed up, you have your link to pass on to others and start earning.  It's a win-win.  By the way, I've earned 800+ tokens this way so far, so it's doable.   so a friendly click on that welcome link,  https://latium.org/welcome/mfchiro then you can follow up and email me if you have more questions or would like to dialogue further on why this is such a great venture, the best one out there right now (in my opinion).  wishing you all success,

Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: I agree.  Something also to consider, and this is a good thing, right now they want to grow WIDE, get as many tokens out there as they can, since they are not really diluting the token value, (0.25 is already pretty much the lowest baseline).  To accomplish the goals of their business plan, latium needs a lot of coin to be circulating, and then the coin will increase in value, more likely at a slower, stable, conservative rate, from a much wider base.    So, as bonuses would dilute the value of the token, it's best to issue the bonus now while the token is priced so low.  That's just my speculation...

That's a 25% extra bonus, even higher if you get the LAT available that's under 0.00018 BTC.   there's about 12k LAT available on HitBTC at these rates. you're substantially increasing the size of your LATX bag for almost no effort and no extra cost by doing this   and you'll also get your LATX much quicker. LAT -> LATX swaps happen as they are requested. LATX won't be released until Jan 2018

Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Burning is an deflationary and security feature for token sales. By burning, the total numbers of coins in circulation is automatically reduced, which increases the value of the available ones. Also, burning ensures that there is transparency by eliminating the possibility of the tokens been used for other things or worst flooding the market/dumping

Author: mexi.db
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: The 21 company which recently rebranded to Earn is quite different from Latium. Latium is decentralized and based on blockchain technology. Also, the Latium platform will enable people from all over the world perform different kinds of tasks, while the 21 service focuses, mainly on responding to emails.

Author: mexi.db
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: "The popularity of online freelance work has exploded in the past years due to the advantages it offers both to workers and employers. The next step is to completely decentralize this industry in order to remove all of its points of failure." https://cointelegraph.com/news/ethereum-blockchain-can-help-building-decentralized-workforce-network This is what the Latium project aims to achieve. This is also a big step towards the adoption of cryptocurrencies. I look forward to see more of what this project has to offer.

Author: Mhz_evadah
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Quote from: Kate_CND on October 26, 2017, 11:22:36 AM Quote from: Mhz_evadah on October 25, 2017, 09:46:27 PM Quote from: Kate_CND on October 25, 2017, 02:55:49 PM Quote from: Mhz_evadah on October 25, 2017, 02:53:52 PM Quote from: Kate_CND on October 23, 2017, 03:52:43 PM Quote from: rahul10948 on October 23, 2017, 02:58:41 PM seems promising...link to bounty please  Here it is https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2276837.0    Kate out of curiosity, can you explain this 'Please, note, if max cap is not raised, the amount of tokens for BTT bounty will be amount_sold/157,839,279*3,000,000=total bounty reward'. Am a little confused with the calculations. - I quoted it from the bounty thread.  Right. What exactly do you confuse with? Could you explain, please?   Does it mean that the amount of tokens issued to bitcointalk bounties will reduce if max cap not reached? And how did the dev team come up with the 157,839,279 value for the calculations.  157,839,279  is the number of tokens for sale during the upcoming sale.  Thanks for the explanation now. I understand it better, I think this is the reason why we need more hands on deck so that beneficiaries cutting across all bounty schedule would profit more.

Author: Kate_CND
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Latium CEO David Johnson comments on CME Group Bitcoin futures announcement https://www.forbes.com/sites/cbovaird/2017/11/01/bitcoin-reaches-new-high-after-futures-announcement/#5f06cb1b1555  David Johnson, CEO of Latium, a tasking platform that pays its users in cryptocurrency, spoke to how these financial instruments could make it easier for companies to accept Bitcoin as payment.  "The CME announcement opens the door to using Bitcoin as a true tender. Bitcoin futures provide the required infrastructure for any business to participate in the Bitcoin phenomenon while mitigating market risk. The ability to hedge market risk is a requirement for any business looking to accept payment in a non-native currency."

Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform

Author: Kate_CND
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Also David Johnson discussed the BTC futures announcement on Business Insider!  http://www.businessinsider.com/bitcoin-future-explained  "The CME announcement provides the first step in legitimizing the ever-growing crypto space as a true financial asset," Dave Johnson, the CEO of Latium, a cryptocurrency technology company, told Business Insider. "For market makers this presents access from a known and trusted party into a $94 billion marketplace."

Author: Latium
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Great question. The ability to do in-person tasks is one of our favorite features of the platform. Pretty much any type of in-person task can be run through the platform. To use construction as an example, you could hire as many people as your budget allows to build something for you. You will be able to have them either scan a QR code at the beginning and end of the task, or require them to be in a certain GPS range for a certain time. The same goes for the entertainment industry. If you want 10,000 people to show up for a concert, you can put that task out there, accept applicants, and run either the QR code or GPS examples in order to verify they were there.  You will also have the option either to automatically release payment or determine individually whether or not the task doers completed the task to your standards.

Author: Latium
Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform
Body: Latium is the world’s first decentralized platform for real world projects and community driven initiatives. Latium’s goal is to improve the world by making a transparent decentralized platform to help harness the world’s labor force, while increasing labor equality and opportunity for those who may not have the ability or opportunity to find work. By creating a digital platform that allows for real world actions to be taken and digital reward given Latium helps bridge the gap between the digital and physical world. You can view more at https://latium.org/.  The Latium ecosystem will consist of many components, but the major roles are played by task doers and task makers. Task makers consist of anyone (Persons, Companies, Organizations, Governments, etc) with a desire to have an action completed and willing to pay a reward to whomever is willing to complete the required task (task doer).  Task doers consist of anyone (Persons, Companies, Organizations, Governments, etc) willing to complete a task for a reward.  In its most basic form Latium is a platform to exchange effort for reward or vice versa. There are many basic examples (Freelancer, Fiver, Upwork, etc.) but all of these examples are very limited in scope and do not facilitate the much broader needs of a global labor market. The Latium platform will allow users around the globe to create tasks of any size, from getting more twitter followers to providing clean water to a Sub-Saharan African community. No task is too big or too small for Latium.  All payments within the Latium Platform will be made using the LATX ERC20 token. This is truly a token with a purpose.    Latium will be hosting a token sale for the new LATX ERC20 token, which will be the only form of payment within the platform. You can purchase the LATX token using ETH.   Token Symbol: LATX   Overview of Token Structure Token Sale: 180,000,000 LATX (60% of total supply) tokens available during all phases of the token sale. Any tokens not sold during this period will be burned.  Platform Adoption Incentives:60,000,000 LATX (20% of total supply) will be used for promotion once the Latium platform is in production. These tokens will provide incentives to sign up and use the Latium platform during the ramp up of production. New users will be allocated a certain amount of tokens to use within the Latium Ecosystem (cannot be withdrawn but can be spent on task creation). These 60 million tokens will be held in a lockup contract and released, according to the schedule below, for use in the system. After release, these funds will be held in a single contract. The only function of this contract will be to release tokens to platform users and will be made available for public inspection prior to the first token release in order to ensure transparency. The below schedule is the maximum that can be withdrawn on a given date. The amount of the withdrawal will be determined at the time of release up to the maximum allowed by the lockup contract. The amount withdrawn will be solely up to the management team and based on project requirements at the time of release. This contract has been made available on Github for public review and etherscan.io  15 million LATX Tokens released - January 31st, 2018 15 million LATX Tokens released - April 30th, 2018 15 million LATX Tokens released - July 31st, 2018 15 million LATX Tokens final incentive released - October 31st, 2018  Founder's Lockup Contract:45,000,000 LATX (15% of total supply) tokens will be held in the founder’s lockup contract for 12 months releasing November 1st 2018. These funds will be used to expand the management team after production release in key areas and founder’s equity. This amount is the maximum amount that can be withdrawn from the Lockup contract. The amounts actually withdrawn will be left up to the founders to decide up to the maximum allowed by the contract. This contract has been made available on Github for public review.  Bounty Programs:15,000,000 LATX (5% of total supply) will be allocated for bounty programs. The following programs are included in this allocation Wings (1% of total supply), General Affiliate System (up to 2.6% of total supply), General Bounty (1% of total supply), Marketing bounties (0.4% of total supply), such as promotional programs, content writing, etc. The Marketing Bounty is an additional bounty campaign, not a guaranteed distribution and will be up to the management team who can receive this bounty. To apply for the Marketing bounty campaign, please, contact support@latium.org.  Meet the Latium Team    Join our Telegram Channel here. Join our Telegram Group here. Follow us on Twitter Subscribe to our Subreddit   All purchases of LATX should be for the sole purpose of use within the platform. This is not an offer for investment or a security. If you are looking to purchase the LATX token with a purpose other than usage within the platform you should reconsider your purchase.

Title: [ANN] Latium Tasking Platform

So if you are a holder of LAT and transfer to LATX then you get a better deal than what will be offered in the general sale.
